channel.title: Error!
channel.description:
WILL PAY UP TO 10M RSGP! :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:
every time i try to join ANY server, or I try to start my server, i get this error: Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel then click start server to make your own.
PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!
even 127.0.0.1!!!!!!!!! :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Error!
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

In other words budda, is your firewall/security center blocking MoparScape from accessing the internet?

item.title: Error!
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

nothing to do with this.

[quote=“zezimasslave7801, post:1, topic:155530”]every time i try to join ANY server, or I try to start my server, i get this error:
Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel then click start server to make your own.

PLEASE HELP!!!
even 127.0.0.1!!! :confused[/quote]

Which means - He can’t find an online server.

I suggest you just keep trying servers on the server status page: www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php.

Enjoy.

Read full topic
